verbs.description: [ARG1: assistant manager] [V: accused] [ARG2: of stealing 200 000 worth of seafood from hamden fish market] the assistant manager of a local seafood store is accused of stealing approximately 200 000 worth of seafood over several years police said hamden police responded to no 1 fish market 2239 state st on april 28 on a report of a larceny the complainant told police that large amounts of seafood had been stolen from the business during the past few years an investigation revealed that lance graver the assistant manager would arrive at work early on monday mornings and allegedly steal approximately 800 worth of seafood police said in a release graver would place the stolen seafood inside his car and then work his assigned day fish market superior court assistant manager fish north branford seafood north branford connecticut lance graver 200 000 hamden
